code: import React from'react';import'./styles.css';import Button from'../button';import{menuTexts}from'../../redux/app/selectors';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{expandProjectsAction,collapseProjectAction}from'../../redux/app/actions';import{createProject}from'../../redux/fetch';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Menu=function Menu(_ref){var projectText=_ref.projectText,expandText=_ref.expandText,collapseText=_ref.collapseText,addProject=_ref.addProject,expand=_ref.expand,collapse=_ref.collapse;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{"data-test":"button-new-project",text:projectText,onClick:function onClick(){return addProject();},type:"primary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{"data-test":"button-expand",text:expandText,onClick:function onClick(){return expand();},type:"secondary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{"data-test":"button-collapse",text:collapseText,onClick:function onClick(){return collapse();},type:"secondary"})]});};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){var texts=menuTexts(state);return{projectText:texts.projectText,expandText:texts.expandText,collapseText:texts.collapseText};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{addProject:function addProject(){return dispatch(createProject());},expand:function expand(){return dispatch(expandProjectsAction());},collapse:function collapse(){return dispatch(collapseProjectAction());}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Menu);
